Paris Saint-Germain have reportedly told Sergio Ramos that he is not part of the club's plans for next season. 

Ramos' current deal with the French side runs until 2023,

articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo's newborn baby boy passes away; Emotional footballer shares a post on Instagram - PINKVILLA
articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo announces the demise of his twin boy in an emotional statement on his Instagram.
